TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Typeface extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 、、 和 的結合。

span.span: Represents a combination of , , , and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字樣是在相同的字型家族內為字型的單一變化。A typeface is a single variation of a font within the same font family. 字樣的範例是"Times New Roman"的字型家族的斜體形式。An example of a typeface is an italic version of the "Times New Roman" font family. 字樣定義的粗細、 樣式和字型自動縮放功能。Typeface defines the weight, style and stretching features of a font. ## Examples [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#102)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#102)]

span.span: The font family that is used when a character is encountered that the primary font family (specified by the fontFamily parameter) cannot display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳遞`null`針對`fallbackFontFamily`參數會導致方塊来顯示的字元不包含在主要字型系列的字元。Passing `null` for the `fallbackFontFamily` parameter causes box characters to be displayed for characters not included in the primary font family. ## Examples [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#105](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#105)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#105](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#105)]

public: property double CapsHeight { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得從基準線到字樣英文大寫字母頂端的距離。

span.span: Gets the distance from the baseline to the top of an English capital letter for the typeface.

value.span: ，表示從基準線到英文大寫字母頂端的距離，以佔字型 em 大小的分數表示。

span.span: A that indicates the distance from the baseline to the top of an English capital letter, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值`1`表示英文大寫字母頂端是一個以上的基準，傳回值時的字型 em`0.5`指出它是字型 em 高於基準。A return value of `1` indicates that the top of an English capital letter is one font em above the baseline, while a return value of `0.5` indicates that it is half a font em above the baseline.

summary.span: 判斷是否模擬 所表示之圖像的粗體。

span.span: Determines whether to simulate a bold weight for the glyphs represented by the .

value.span: 如果要使用圖像的粗體模擬則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if bold simulation is used for glyphs; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A可以模擬自動縮放以圖像的粗體。A can simulate a bold weight by stretching a glyph. 非模擬的粗體字旨在通常更佳的視覺外觀，比模擬的粗體字。A non-simulated bold typeface is typically designed to have a better visual appearance than a simulated bold typeface.

public: property bool IsObliqueSimulated { bool get(); };

value.span: 如果要使用圖像的斜體模擬則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if italic simulation is used for glyphs; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A切變或傾斜，圖像 （glyph） 可以模擬的斜體字樣。A can simulate an italic style by shearing, or slanting, a glyph. 非模擬的斜體字樣旨在通常更佳的視覺外觀，比模擬的斜體字樣。A non-simulated italic typeface is typically designed to have a better visual appearance than a simulated italic typeface.

summary.span: 取得 的自動縮放值。

span.span: Gets the stretch value for the .

summary.span: 自動縮放值可決定字樣在顯示時是要擴展或壓縮。

span.span: The stretch value determines whether a typeface is expanded or condensed when it is displayed.

value.span: 值，表示字樣的自動縮放值。

span.span: A value that represents the stretch value for the typeface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字型自動縮放值會描述要字型形式自動縮放從其一般的外觀比例，這是原始的寬度與高度比率指定字型中字符的程度。A font stretch value describes the degree to which a font form is stretched from its normal aspect ratio, which is the original width to height ratio specified for the glyphs in the font. ## Examples [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#108)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#108)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StrikethroughPosition As Double
public: property double StrikethroughPosition { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出從基準線到字樣刪除線的距離。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the distance from the baseline to the strikethrough for the typeface.

value.span: ，表示刪除線位置，是從基準開始測量並以佔字型 em 大小的分數表示。

span.span: A that indicates the strikethrough position, measured from the baseline and expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值`0.1`表示刪除線的位置是字型 em 高於基準，同時傳回值的十分之一`0.25`表示其 4 個字型 em 高於基準。A return value of `0.1` indicates that the strikethrough position is one-tenth of a font em above the baseline, while a return value of `0.25` indicates that its one-fourth of a font em above the baseline.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StrikethroughThickness As Double
public: property double StrikethroughThickness { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出相對於字型 em 大小的刪除線粗細。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the thickness of the strikethrough relative to the font em size.

value.span: ，指出刪除線的粗細，以字型 em 大小的一部分來表示。

span.span: A that indicates the strikethrough thickness, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值`0.05`表示刪除線粗細是 1 / 20 個字型 em 大小，傳回值時`0.1`表示刪除線粗細是十分之一的字型 em 大小。A return value of `0.05` indicates that the strikethrough thickness is one-twentieth of the font em size, while a return value of `0.1` indicates that the strikethrough thickness is one-tenth of the font em size.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnderlinePosition As Double
public: property double UnderlinePosition { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示從字樣基準到底線的距離。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the distance of the underline from the baseline for the typeface.

value.span: ，表示底線位置，是從基準開始測量並以佔字型 em 大小的分數表示。

span.span: A that indicates the underline position, measured from the baseline and expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值通常是負數，將低於基準的底線。The return value is usually negative, to place the underline below the baseline. 例如，傳回值`-0.1`表示底線位置字型 em 低於基準，同時傳回值的十分之一`-0.25`指出它是個字型 em 低於基準的四分之一。For example, a return value of `-0.1` indicates that the underline position is one-tenth of a font em below the baseline, while a return value of `-0.25` indicates that it is one-fourth of a font em below the baseline.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnderlineThickness As Double
public: property double UnderlineThickness { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示底線粗細，以相對於字樣字型 em 大小的值表示。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the thickness of the underline relative to the font em size for the typeface.

value.span: ，表示底線粗細，以字型 em 大小的分數表示。

span.span: A that indicates the underline thickness, expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值`0.05`表示底線粗細，1 / 20 個字型 em 大小，傳回值時`0.1`表示底線粗細，字型 em 大小的十分之一。A return value of `0.05` indicates that the underline thickness is one-twentieth of the font em size, while a return value of `0.1` indicates that the underline thickness is one-tenth of the font em size.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Weight As FontWeight
public: property System::Windows::FontWeight Weight { System::Windows::FontWeight get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得字樣的相對粗細。

span.span: Gets the relative weight of the typeface.

value.span: 值，表示字樣的相對粗細。

span.span: A value that represents the relative weight of the typeface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 權數差異通常由增加的筆劃或相關聯之指定字元的字樣，相較於 「 正常 」 的字元從該相同的字體粗細區分。Weight differences are generally differentiated by an increased stroke or thickness associated with a given character in a typeface, as compared to a "normal" character from that same typeface. **請注意**並非所有的權數可供所有的字樣。**Note** Not all weights are available for all typefaces. 無法使用字樣加權時，會傳回最接近的相符加權。When a weight is not available for a typeface, the closest matching weight is returned. ## Examples [!code-csharp[FontSnippets#110](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#110)] [!code-vb[FontSnippets#110](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FontSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#110)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property XHeight As Double
public: property double XHeight { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得從基準線到字樣英文小寫字母頂端的距離。

span.span: Gets the distance from the baseline to the top of an English lowercase letter for a typeface.

summary.span: 距離不包含上格。

span.span: The distance excludes ascenders.

value.span: ，表示從基準線到英文小寫字母頂端的距離 (不包含上格)，以佔字型 em 大小的分數表示。

span.span: A that indicates the distance from the baseline to the top of an English lowercase letter (excluding ascenders), expressed as a fraction of the font em size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值`0.25`表示英文字母頂端的 4 個以上的基準，傳回值時的字型 em`0.75`表示英文字母頂端的四分之三的字型 em 高於基準。A return value of `0.25` indicates that the top of an English letter is one-fourth of a font em above the baseline, while a return value of `0.75` indicates that the top of an English letter is three-fourths of a font em above the baseline.
